title.rendered: Box of 50 4mm Otoscope Ear High-Quality Non-Latex  Specula

content.rendered:
The 4mm diameter makes it easy to see the inner ear clearly but for those who have smaller ear canals, an otoscope ear speculum with a smaller diameter is advised.

  • All the edges are smoothed out to ensure no sharp edges bruise the patient’s ear.

 4MM OTOSCOPE EAR SPECULA ARE USED ON THE EARS OF ADULTS OR OLDER CHILDREN. WITH THESE, CROSS-INFECTION AMONG PATIENTS AS WELL AS PATIENT ALLERGIC REACTION IS PREVENTED WHILE STILL PROVIDING THE PATIENTS WITH COMFORT.

The 4mm Otoscope Ear Specula is made of a high quality non latex material that helps prevent any latex allergies occurring. Each of the ready to use otoscope ear speculum should only be used by a single patient to prevent the spread of any infection from one to another. These are compatible with Heine otoscope brands many others with Heine fit.
